name: Clown Pup
description:
Ever wanted to feel like a child again? Well now you can, as an orange-seeking clown dog. The devs were not high, you were.

We didn't have time to finish everything, we will update the game will all the features within a month.

Controls:

LMB - Walk

E - Interact

Tab - Inventory

Credits:

  • Maksymilian "Skill" Tym - Lead, Game Design & Code
  • "Żaba" Mazur - Graphic Design, Game Design
  • Nikodem Maciaszek - Graphic Design (hand drawn)
  • Tymon "Hoody" Hyc - SFX
  • Marcel Gąsiorowski - Music
